titles.title: A bill making appropriations to resume payment to the Local Government Fiscal Assistance Trust Fund for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1988.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 12/3/1987--Introduced. Makes appropriations for FY 1988 to resume payments to the Local Government Fiscal Assistance Trust Fund for State and local activities under the revenue sharing program at specified levels.
